text: Niwali, Madhya Pradesh is a village & Tehsil in Barwani district in the Indian state of Madhya Pradesh. ==Geography== Niwali is located in the Narmada Valley, at . It has an average elevation of . Situated on MP SH 36, Niwali lies from Sendhwa. It is a Tehsil of Barwani district. ==References== ==External links== * Barwani District Category:Barwani Category:Villages in Barwani district Category:Barwani district
title: Niwali, Madhya Pradesh
